Seated Leg Lifts.name: Seated Leg Lifts
Seated Leg Lifts.description: Sit in a chair and lift your legs one at a time to work your lower body.
Seated Leg Lifts.tip: Engage your core while lifting your legs.

Standing Side Leg Lifts.name: Standing Side Leg Lifts
Standing Side Leg Lifts.description: Stand and lift your leg to the side to strengthen your hips and thighs.
Standing Side Leg Lifts.tip: Keep your posture straight and avoid leaning.

Chair Squats.name: Chair Squats
Chair Squats.description: Sit and stand up from a chair repeatedly to work your thighs and glutes.
Chair Squats.tip: Keep your knees behind your toes as you squat.

Wall Push-ups.name: Wall Push-ups
Wall Push-ups.description: Perform push-ups against a wall to build upper body strength.
Wall Push-ups.tip: Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line.

Step Touch.name: Step Touch
Step Touch.description: Step side to side, touching your feet together.
Step Touch.tip: Maintain a slight bend in your knees as you move.

Toe Taps.name: Toe Taps
Toe Taps.description: Tap your toes on the ground in a rhythmic motion.
Toe Taps.tip: Keep your core engaged while performing this move.

Arm Circles.name: Arm Circles
Arm Circles.description: Make small circles with your arms to work your shoulders.
Arm Circles.tip: Start with small circles and gradually increase the size.

Marching in Place.name: Marching in Place
Marching in Place.description: Lift your knees one at a time as if you're marching in place.
Marching in Place.tip: Use your arms to increase intensity.

Jumping Jacks.name: Jumping Jacks
Jumping Jacks.description: Jump with your arms and legs wide, then return to standing.
Jumping Jacks.tip: Engage your core and keep a steady rhythm.

Burpees.name: Burpees
Burpees.description: Squat down, jump into a plank position, then jump up.
Burpees.tip: Make sure to land softly when you jump back up.

Mountain Climbers.name: Mountain Climbers
Mountain Climbers.description: In a plank position, alternate bringing your knees to your chest.
Mountain Climbers.tip: Keep your core tight and avoid letting your hips drop.

High Knees.name: High Knees
High Knees.description: Lift your knees high as you march or run in place.
High Knees.tip: Engage your core and maintain a brisk pace.

Squat Jumps.name: Squat Jumps
Squat Jumps.description: Perform a squat, then explode upwards into a jump.
Squat Jumps.tip: Land softly and keep your knees behind your toes.

Skater Jumps.name: Skater Jumps
Skater Jumps.description: Jump laterally from one foot to the other, mimicking a skating motion.
Skater Jumps.tip: Focus on balance and control as you land.

Lateral Hops.name: Lateral Hops
Lateral Hops.description: Hop side to side with both feet together.
Lateral Hops.tip: Keep your knees slightly bent as you jump.

Tuck Jumps.name: Tuck Jumps
Tuck Jumps.description: Jump up and bring your knees towards your chest.
Tuck Jumps.tip: Land softly and keep your back straight.

Deadlifts.name: Deadlifts
Deadlifts.description: Lift weights from the ground to standing, targeting your lower back and hamstrings.
Deadlifts.tip: Keep your back straight and hinge at your hips.

Bicep Curls.name: Bicep Curls
Bicep Curls.description: Curl weights towards your shoulders to work your biceps.
Bicep Curls.tip: Keep your elbows close to your sides.

Triceps Dips.name: Triceps Dips
Triceps Dips.description: Dip your body down while holding a bench or chair to work your triceps.
Triceps Dips.tip: Keep your elbows pointing straight back.

Lunges with Weights.name: Lunges with Weights
Lunges with Weights.description: Lunge forward while holding weights to work your legs and glutes.
Lunges with Weights.tip: Keep your knee aligned with your ankle.

Bench Press.name: Bench Press
Bench Press.description: Press weights away from your chest while lying on a bench.
Bench Press.tip: Ensure your back remains flat against the bench.

Overhead Shoulder Press.name: Overhead Shoulder Press
Overhead Shoulder Press.description: Press weights overhead to target your shoulders.
Overhead Shoulder Press.tip: Keep your core engaged and avoid arching your back.

Dumbbell Rows.name: Dumbbell Rows
Dumbbell Rows.description: Row dumbbells towards your torso to work your back muscles.
Dumbbell Rows.tip: Maintain a flat back and squeeze your shoulder blades together.

Goblet Squats.name: Goblet Squats
Goblet Squats.description: Hold a weight close to your chest and perform squats.
Goblet Squats.tip: Keep your chest upright and knees behind your toes.

Push-ups.name: Push-ups
Push-ups.description: Perform a push-up to strengthen your chest and arms.
Push-ups.tip: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.

Planks.name: Planks
Planks.description: Hold a plank position to strengthen your core.
Planks.tip: Keep your back straight and engage your core.

Wall Sit.name: Wall Sit
Wall Sit.description: Sit against a wall with your knees at a 90-degree angle.
Wall Sit.tip: Engage your core and hold the position as long as possible.

Superman Hold.name: Superman Hold
Superman Hold.description: Lie on your stomach and lift your arms and legs off the ground.
Superman Hold.tip: Squeeze your lower back as you lift.

Bicycle Crunches.name: Bicycle Crunches
Bicycle Crunches.description: Lie on your back and alternate bringing your knees towards your chest while twisting your torso.
Bicycle Crunches.tip: Focus on engaging your core rather than rushing.

Side Lunges.name: Side Lunges
Side Lunges.description: Lunge out to the side, alternating legs.
Side Lunges.tip: Keep your chest upright and knees behind your toes.

Donkey Kicks.name: Donkey Kicks
Donkey Kicks.description: Kick one leg up while keeping the other knee on the ground.
Donkey Kicks.tip: Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.

Flutter Kicks.name: Flutter Kicks
Flutter Kicks.description: Lie on your back and alternate kicking your legs up and down.
Flutter Kicks.tip: Keep your core engaged and legs straight.

Battle Ropes.name: Battle Ropes
Battle Ropes.description: Swing heavy ropes in various patterns to engage your entire body.
Battle Ropes.tip: Use your core to control the ropes.

Kettlebell Swings.name: Kettlebell Swings
Kettlebell Swings.description: Swing a kettlebell between your legs and up to chest height.
Kettlebell Swings.tip: Use your hips to generate power for the swing.

Medicine Ball Slams.name: Medicine Ball Slams
Medicine Ball Slams.description: Lift a medicine ball overhead and slam it to the ground.
Medicine Ball Slams.tip: Engage your core and use your full body to generate force.

Jump Rope.name: Jump Rope
Jump Rope.description: Jump over a rope as it swings beneath you.
Jump Rope.tip: Keep your jumps light and use your wrists to turn the rope.

Box Jumps.name: Box Jumps
Box Jumps.description: Jump onto a sturdy box or platform, then step down.
Box Jumps.tip: Land softly to protect your knees.

Sled Push.name: Sled Push
Sled Push.description: Push a weighted sled to engage your legs and core.
Sled Push.tip: Keep a low stance and drive with your legs.

Tire Flips.name: Tire Flips
Tire Flips.description: Flip a large tire end over end for strength and conditioning.
Tire Flips.tip: Use your legs to lift, not just your back.

Sledgehammer Slams.name: Sledgehammer Slams
Sledgehammer Slams.description: Swing a sledgehammer onto a tire to build strength.
Sledgehammer Slams.tip: Engage your core and use your hips to generate power.

Cat-Cow Stretch.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
Cat-Cow Stretch.description: Alternate arching and rounding your back to stretch the spine.

Side-Lying Leg Lifts.name: Side-Lying Leg Lifts
Side-Lying Leg Lifts.description: Lie on your side and lift your leg up and down.
Side-Lying Leg Lifts.tip: Keep your torso stable and leg straight.

Pelvic Tilts.name: Pelvic Tilts
Pelvic Tilts.description: Lie on your back and tilt your pelvis upwards.
Pelvic Tilts.tip: Focus on engaging your lower abs.

Seated Forward Bend.name: Seated Forward Bend
Seated Forward Bend.description: Sit and bend forward to stretch your hamstrings.
Seated Forward Bend.tip: Reach for your toes and keep your back straight.

Kegel Exercises.name: Kegel Exercises
Kegel Exercises.description: Contract and relax your pelvic floor muscles.
Kegel Exercises.tip: Focus on squeezing and holding the muscles for a few seconds.

Butterfly Stretch.name: Butterfly Stretch
Butterfly Stretch.description: Sit and bring your feet together to stretch your inner thighs.
Butterfly Stretch.tip: Gently press your knees towards the floor.

Standing Hip Circles.name: Standing Hip Circles
Standing Hip Circles.description: Stand and make circles with your hips to loosen up your body.
Standing Hip Circles.tip: Engage your core and move slowly.

Seated Side Stretch.name: Seated Side Stretch
Seated Side Stretch.description: Sit and reach one arm overhead to stretch the side of your body.
Seated Side Stretch.tip: Lean gently to one side to feel the stretch.

Glute Bridges.name: Glute Bridges
Glute Bridges.description: Lie on your back and lift your hips to engage your glutes and core.
Glute Bridges.tip: Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.

Pelvic Floor Exercises.name: Pelvic Floor Exercises
Pelvic Floor Exercises.description: Engage your pelvic floor muscles to strengthen them.
Pelvic Floor Exercises.tip: Focus on squeezing and holding for a few seconds.

Postnatal Yoga Twists.name: Postnatal Yoga Twists
Postnatal Yoga Twists.description: Sit and twist your torso to gently stretch your back.
Postnatal Yoga Twists.tip: Move slowly and listen to your body.

Side Planks.name: Side Planks
Side Planks.description: Lie on your side and lift your hips off the ground to strengthen your core.
Side Planks.tip: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.

Dead Bug Exercise.name: Dead Bug Exercise
Dead Bug Exercise.description: Lie on your back and alternate extending your arm and leg.
Dead Bug Exercise.tip: Keep your core engaged and move slowly.

Bird-Dog.name: Bird-Dog
Bird-Dog.description: From a hands and knees position, extend opposite arm and leg.
Bird-Dog.tip: Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.

Heel Slides.name: Heel Slides
Heel Slides.description: Slide one heel out while keeping your core engaged.
Heel Slides.tip: Keep your back flat on the floor.

Clamshells.name: Clamshells
Clamshells.description: Lie on your side and open and close your legs like a clamshell.
Clamshells.tip: Keep your feet together and engage your glutes.

Downward Dog.name: Downward Dog
Downward Dog.description: Form an inverted V shape, stretching your back and legs.
Downward Dog.tip: Push through your heels and extend your spine.

Warrior Pose.name: Warrior Pose
Warrior Pose.description: Stand with legs wide apart and bend one knee while keeping your arms extended.
Warrior Pose.tip: Engage your core and maintain steady breathing.

Child’s Pose.name: Child’s Pose
Child’s Pose.description: Sit back on your heels and extend your arms forward to stretch.

Cobra Pose.name: Cobra Pose
Cobra Pose.description: Lie on your stomach and lift your chest off the ground.
Cobra Pose.tip: Keep your elbows close to your sides.

Tree Pose.name: Tree Pose
Tree Pose.description: Stand on one leg and place the foot of the other leg against your thigh.
Tree Pose.tip: Engage your core and focus on a fixed point.

Triangle Pose.name: Triangle Pose
Triangle Pose.description: Stand with legs wide apart and stretch your body towards one foot.
Triangle Pose.tip: Keep your legs straight and engage your core.

Seated Forward Fold.name: Seated Forward Fold
Seated Forward Fold.description: Sit and fold forward, reaching for your toes.
Seated Forward Fold.tip: Reach slowly and keep your back straight.

Bridge Pose.name: Bridge Pose
Bridge Pose.description: Lie on your back and lift your hips while keeping your feet flat on the floor.
Bridge Pose.tip: Squeeze your glutes at the top
